chapter.text: 26|1|Tba-china-mima.
26|2|E'ibora suspasta kitabara ayata.
26|3|Sihamte mumina horaa na'i buli hayato tumi atmaghati hai paraiba.
26|4|Ami iccha karaile akasara paraa sihamtara oparata enekuraa nidarsana aratirna karailohemtena, yara phalata se'itora prati sihamtara ghara aranata hai parailehemtena.
26|5|Arau yetiya'i sihamtara ocarata rahamanara taraphara paraa kono natuna upadesa ahe, tetiya'i sihamte tara paraa mukha ghuraa'i laya.
26|6|Eteke sihamte arasye asbikara karaiche. Seye sihamte yito lai thatta-bidraupa karaichila tara prakrta barta sihamtara ocarata ati sighrae ahi paraiba.
26|7|Sihamte prthiraira phale laksya nakarae neki? Ami tata pratyeka prakarara bahuto utkrsta udbhida utpanna karaicho
26|8|niscaya iyata ache nidarsana, kintu sihamtara sarahabhage'i mumina nahaya.
26|9|Arau niscaya tomara raba, teraemi maha paraakramasali, parama dayalu.
26|10|Arau smarana karaa, yetiya tomara pratipalake muchaka mati ka’le, ‘tumi yalima sampradayara ocaralai yoraa
26|11|phira'a'unara sampradayara ocarata; sihamte takbaraa aralambana nakaraiba ne’
26|12|mucha'i ka’le, ‘he mora raba! Mora asanka haiche ye, sihamte moka asbikara karaiba.
26|13|‘Arau mora buku sankucita hai paraiche, lagate mora jibha'o sbabharaika nahaya. Eteke tumi haraunara prati'o ahi praerana karaa.
26|14|‘Arau mora biraud'dhe sihamtara ocarata eta abhiyogo ache, seye mora asanka haiche ye, sihamte moka hatya karaiba’.
26|15|Allahe ka’le, ‘nahaya, ketiya'o nahaya, tomaloka duyo mora nidarsana lai yoraa, niscaya ami tomalokara lagata acho sraranakarai hicape.
26|16|‘Eteke tomaloka duyo phira'a'unara ocarata gai koraa, ‘niscaya ami bisbajagatara pratipalakara (taraphara paraa praeraita) raachula
26|17|‘yate tumi bani icharaa'ilaka amara lagata patha'i diya’.
26|18|Phira'a'une ka’le, ‘ami tomaka saisara kalata amara majate lalana-palana karaa nachilo ne? Arau arasye tumi tomara jiranara bahu bachara amara majate atibahita karaicha
26|19|‘arau tumi tomara karma yito karaibalagiya se'ito karaichaye arau tumi akrtajnasakalara antarbhukta’.
26|20|Mucha'i ka’le, ‘se'ito ma'i karaichilo tetiya, yetiya ma'i bibhraanta achilo’.

26|21|‘Eteke yetiya ma'i tomalokaka bhaya karaichilo, tetiya ma'i tomalokara paraa palayana karaichilo. Iyara pichata mora pratipalake moka prajna (nabu'orata) dana karaiche arau moka raachulasakalara antarbhukta karaiche.
26|22|‘Arau mora prati tomara yi anugrahara katha ullekha karai tumi daya dekhuraa'i acha, tara prakrta satya e'ito ye, tumi bani icharaa'ilaka dasata parainata karaicha’.
26|23|Phira'a'une ka’le, ‘srstijagatara raba akau ki’
26|24|mucha'i ka’le, ‘teraemi akasasamuha, prthirai arau e'i duyora madhyararti sakalo bastura raba, yadi tomaloke niscita bisbasi horaa’.
26|25|Phira'a'une tara ocarae pajarae thaka lokasakalaka laksya karai ka’le, ‘tomaloke manoyoga sahakarae sunichane’
26|26|mucha'i ka’le, ‘teraemi tomalokara raba arau tomalokara purbapurausasakalorao raba’.
26|27|Phira'a'une ka’le, ‘tomalokara prati praeraita tomalokara e'i raachulajana niscaya ejana baliya’.
26|28|Mucha'i ka’le, ‘te'om pura arau pascimara lagate e'i duyora majata yi ache se'i sakalo bastura raba; yadi tomaloke buji poraa’.
26|29|Phira'a'une ka’le, ‘yadi tumi mora paraibarte anaka ilaharaupe grahana karaa tente ma'i tomaka arasye karaaraud'dha karaima’.
26|30|Mucha'i ka’le, ‘yadi ma'i tomara ocarata spasta kono bisaya lai ahom, tathapi'o’
26|31|phira'a'une ka’le, ‘yadi tumi satyabadi horaa tente seya lai aha’.
26|32|Tara pichata mucha'i te'omra lakhutidala niksepa karaile tatksanata seya edala spasta ajagara sapata parainata ha’la.
26|33|Arau mucha'i te'omra hata (kasalatira paraa) ola'i anara phalata tatksanata seya darsakara drstita subhra ujjbala pratibhata ha’la.
26|34|Phira'a'une tara ocarae pajarae thaka paraisadabargaka uddesya karai ka’le, ‘niscaya e'om ejana sudaksa yadukara’.
26|35|‘E'om nijara yadu saktirae tomalokaka tomalokara desara paraa'i bahiskrta karaiba bicarae. Eteke tomaloke moka ki paraamarsa diya’
26|36|Sihamte ka’le, ‘te'omka arau te'omra bhatrka kichu samaya arakasa diyaka arau nagarae nagarae sangraahakasakalaka patha'i diyaka
26|37|‘yate sihamte aponara ocarata pratyeka abhijna yadukaraka lai upasthita haya’.
26|38|Tara pichata eta nirdharaita dinara nirdista samayata yadukarasakalaka ekatraita karaa ha’la
26|39|arau manuhaka koraa ha’la, ‘tomaloke'o samabeta ha’bane’
26|40|‘yate ami yadukarasakalaka anusarana karaiba parao, yadi sihamte bijayi haya’.
26|41|Eteke yetiya yadukarabilake ahi phira'a'unaka ka’le, ‘yadi ami bijayi ha'om tente amara babe puraskara thakiba ne’
26|42|phira'a'une ka’le, ‘haya, arau niscaya tomaloka tetiya mora ghanistasakalara antarbhukta ha’ba’.
26|43|Mucha'i sihamtaka ka’le, ‘tomalokara yi niksepa karaibalagiya ache seya niksepa karaa’.
26|44|Tara pichata sihamte sihamtara rachi arau lakhutibora niksepa karaile arau sihamte ka’le, ‘phira'a'unara maryadara sapata! Niscaya amiye'i bijayi hama’.
26|45|Tara pichata mucha'i te'omra lakhutidala niksepa karaile, phalata tatksanata i sihamtara micha kirtisamuha graasa karaibalai dharaile.
26|46|Tetiya yadukarasakala chajadaranata hai paraila.
26|47|Te'omloke ka’le, ‘ami imana anilo srstijagatara pratipalakara prati
26|48|‘yijana mucha arau haraunara raba’.

26|49|Phira'a'une ka’le, ‘ma'i tomalokaka anumati diyara agate'i tomaloke tara prati bisbasa karaila? Niscaya siye tomalokara pradhana arau siye tomalokaka yadu siksa diche. Eteke atisighrae tomaloke iyara parainama paba. Niscaya ami tomalokara hata arau bharai biparaita disara paraa kati dima arau tomaloka sakaloke sulabid'dha karaima’.
26|50|Te'omloke ka’le, ‘kono asubidha na'i, niscaya ami amara pratipalakara phale'i ubhati yama.
26|51|Niscaya ami asa posana karao ye, amara pratipalake amara aparaadhasamuha ksama karai diba, karana amiye muminasakalara majata prathama.
26|52|Arau ami muchara prati e'i marme ahi karaichilo ye, ‘amara bandasakalaka lai raatira bhitarate ola'i yoraa, niscaya tomalokaka piche piche khedi yoraa ha’ba’.
26|53|Tara pichata phira'a'une caharae caharae loka sangrahakarai praerana karaile
26|54|‘niscaya ihamta ksudra eta dala
26|55|‘arau niscaya sihamte amara kraodha udraeka karaiche
26|56|‘arau niscaya ami sakalo sadaya satarka’.
26|57|Parainamata ami phira'a'una gosthika sihamtara udyanasamuha arau prasraranara paraa bahiskara karailo
26|58|lagate dhana-bhandara arau manorama saudhamalara paraa'o.
26|59|E'idarae'i haichila arau ami bani icharaa'ilaka karaichilo e'iborara adhikarai.
26|60|Tara pichata sihamte suryodayara praakamuhurtata te'omlokara picha la’le.
26|61|Eteke yetiya duyo dale parasparaka dekhile, tetiya muchara sangisakale ka’le, ‘niscaya ami dharaa parailo!’
26|62|Mucha'i ka’le, ‘ketiya'o nahaya, mora lagata mora pratipalaka ache; anatipalame te'om moka pathanirdesa karaiba’.
26|63|Tara pichata ami muchara prati ahi karailo ye, ‘tomara lakhutirae sagarata aghata karaa’. Phalata sagara bibhakta hai pratyeka bhaga bisala parbatara darae hai ga’la
26|64|arau ami ana dalatoko se'i tha'ira nikatararti karailo
26|65|arau ami ud'dhara karailo mucha arau te'omra sangisakala
26|66|tara pichata duba'i marailo anato dalaka.
26|67|Niscaya iyara majata ache nidarsana, kintu sihamtara adhikansa'i mumina nahaya.
26|68|Arau niscaya tomara raba mahaparaakramasali, parama dayalu.
26|69|Arau tumi sihamtara ocarata ibraahimara brttanta barnana karaa.
26|70|Yetiya te'om te'omra pitrka arau nija sampradayaka kaichila, ‘tomaloke kihara ibadata karaa’
26|71|sihamte ka’le, ‘ami murti puja karao; eteke ami nisthara saite se'itoke dharai thakima’.
26|72|Te'om ka’le, ‘tomaloke yetiya ahbana karaa tetiya se'iborae tomalokara ahbana suna payane
26|73|‘athaba sihamte tomalokara upakara na'iba ksati karaiba parae neki’
26|74|sihamte ka’le, ‘baram ami amara pitrpurausa sakalaka pa'icho, te'omloke enekuraa'i karaichila’.
26|75|Ibraahime ka’le, ‘tomaloke bhabi ca'ichane, yisakalara ibadata tomaloke karaa
26|76|‘tomaloka arau tomalokara pitrpurausa sakala
26|77|‘ataye mora satrau kerala bisbajagatara raba (allaha)ra bahirae.
26|78|‘Yijane moka srsti karaiche, tara pichata teraemi moka hidayata diche.
26|79|‘Teraemi moka ahara karaaya arau teraemi moka pana karaaya.
26|80|‘Arau yetiya ma'i asustha ha'om, tetiya teraemi moka araogya karae.
26|81|‘Teraemi mora mrtyu ghataba arau teraemi moka punarjiraita karaiba.
26|82|‘Arau te'omra ocarate'i mora asa ye, te'om moka kiyamatara dina mora aparaadhasamuha ksama karai diba.
26|83|‘He mora raba! Moka hikamata dana karaa arau satkarmasilasakalara antarbhukta karaa.
26|84|‘Arau pararartisakalara majata mora sunama-sukhyati abyahata raakha
26|85|‘arau moka sukhamaya jannatara adhikaraisakalara antarbhukta karaa
26|86|‘arau mora pitrka ksama karaa, niscaya te'om pathabhrastabilakara antarbhukta achila.
26|87|‘Arau (he mora raba!) Punaraut'thanara dina moka lanchita nakaraiba.
26|88|‘Yidina dhana-sampada- arau santana-santati kono kamata nahiba
26|89|‘se'idina upakrta ha’ba kerala se'i byakti, yijane lai ahiba allahara ocarata bisud'dha antahkarana’.
26|90|Arau (se'idina) muttakbisakalara babe nikatararti karaa ha’ba jannata
26|91|arau pathabhrastasakalara babe unmocita karaa ha’ba jahannama
26|92|sihamtaka koraa ha’ba, ‘tomalokara se'ibora upasya ka’ta, yiborara tomaloke upasana karaichila
26|93|allahara paraibarte? Sihamte tomalokaka sahaya karaiba paraene athaba sihamte atmaraksa karaibalai saksama ne
26|94|tara pichata se'i upasyaboraka arau pathabhrastabilakaka talamura karai jahannamata niksepa karaa ha’ba
26|95|lagate ibalichara sain'yabahinibilakako.
26|96|Sihamte tata bitarkata lipta hai ka’ba
26|97|‘allahara sapata! Niscaya ami spasta pathabhrastatata achilo
26|98|‘yetiya ami tomalokaka srstijagatara pratipalakara samakaksa buli ganya karaichilo
26|99|‘arau amaka kerala aparaadhibilake'i pathabhrasta karaichila
26|100|‘Eteke amara kono chuparaichakarai na'i’.
26|101|‘Arau kono antaranga bandhu'o na'i.
26|102|‘Haya, yadi ami akau ebara ubhati yoraara suyoga palohemtena, tente ami muminasakalara antarbhukta hai ga’lohemtena!’
26|103|Niscaya iyata ache nidarsana, kintu sihamtara adhikansa'i mumina nahaya.
26|104|Arau tomara raba, niscaya te'om mahaparaakramasali, parama dayalu.
26|105|Nuha sampradaye'o raachulasakalaka asbikara karaichila.
26|106|Yetiya sihamtara bhatr nuhe sihamtaka kaichila, ‘tomaloke takbaraa aralambana nakaraiba ne’
26|107|‘niscaya ma'i tomalokara babe ejana bisbasta raachula.
26|108|‘Eteke tomaloke allahara takbaraa aralambana karaa arau mora anusarana karaa.
26|109|‘Arau ma'i tomalokara ocarata iyara babe kono pratidana nibicarao; mora pratidana kerala srstijagatara raba (allaha)ra ocarata.
26|110|‘Eteke tomaloke allahara takbaraa aralambana karaa arau mora anugatya karaa.’
26|111|Sihamte ka’le, ‘ami tomara prati imana anima neki athaca tomaka kerala nimnasraenira manuhe'i anusarana karaiche’
26|112|nuhe ka’le, ‘sihamte ki karae seya jana mora ki prayojana
26|113|‘sihamtara hicapa loraa kerala mora pratipalakarahe kama; yadi tomaloke buji palahemtena
26|114|‘arau muminasakalaka khedi pathi'oraa mora kama nahaya.
26|115|‘Ma'ihe kerala ejana spasta satarkakarai’.
26|116|Sihamte ka’le, ‘he nuha! Yadi tumi birata nohoraa tente arasye tumi sila daliya'i nihata karaa sakalara antarbhukta ha’ba’.
26|117|Nuhe (praarthana karai) ka’le, ‘he mora raba! Mora sampradaye moka asbikara karaiche’.
26|118|‘Seye tumi mora arau sihamtara majata spasta mimansa karai diya lagate moka arau mora lagara muminasakalaka raksa karaa’.
26|119|Phalata ami te'omka arau te'omra lagata yisakala achila sakaloke boja'i narata araohana karaa'i raksa karailo.
26|120|Tara pichata baki thaka sakalaka duba'i marailo.
26|121|Niscaya iyata ache nidarsana, kintu sihamtara bechi bhage'i mumina nahaya.
26|122|Arau tomara raba, niscaya te'om mahaparaakramasali, parama dayalu.
26|123|Ada sampradaye'o raachulasakalaka asbikara karaichila
26|124|yetiya sihamtara bhatr hude sihamtaka kaichila, ‘tomaloke takbaraa aralambana nakaraibane
26|125|‘niscaya ma'i tomalokara babe ejana bisbasta raachula.
26|126|‘Eteke tomaloke allahara takbaraa aralambana karaa arau mora anugatya karaa.
26|127|‘Iyara babe ma'i tomalokara ocarata kono pratidana nibicarao, mora pratidana kerala srstijagatara raba (allaha)ra ocarata.
26|128|‘Tomaloke kiya pratito ucca sthanata ayatha saudha nirmana karaa
26|129|‘arau tomaloke enekai prasadasamuha nirmana karai acha, yeniba tomaloka sthayi.
26|130|‘Arau yetiya tomaloke aghata karaa tetiya sbecchacarai hai aghata karaa.
26|131|‘Eteke tomaloke allahara takbaraa aralambana karaa arau moka anusarana karaa.
26|132|‘Arau tomaloke takbaraa aralambana karaa se'i sattara yijane tomalokaka dana karaiche se'i sakalo bisaya, yibora tomaloke jana.
26|133|‘Teraemi tomalokaka dana karaiche catuspada jantu arau putra santana
26|134|‘udyana arau jharnasamuha
26|135|‘niscaya ma'i tomalokara babe eta maha dirasara sastira bhaya karao’.
26|136|Sihamte ka’le, ‘tumi amaka upadesa diya ba nidiya, ubhaye amara babe samana.
26|137|‘Eya purbarartisakalarahe sbabhara.
26|138|‘Ami ketiya'o sastipraapta naha'om’.
26|139|Eteke sihamte te'omka asbikara karaile, phalata ami sihamtaka dhbansa karailo. Niscaya iyata ache nidarsana, kintu sihamtara sarahabhage'i mumina nahaya.
26|140|Arau tomara raba, niscaya te'om mahaparaakramasali, parama dayalu.
26|141|Chamuda sampradaye'o raachulasakalaka asbikara karaichila
26|142|yetiya sihamtara bhatr chalehe sihamtaka kaichila, ‘tomaloke allahara takbaraa aralambana nakaraibane
26|143|‘niscaya ma'i tomalokara babe ejana bisbasta raachula.
26|144|‘Eteke tomaloke allahara takbaraa aralambana karaa arau mora anugatya karaa.
26|145|‘Iyara babe ma'i tomalokara ocarata kono pratidana nibicarao, mora pratidana kerala srstijagatara raba (allaha)ra ocarata.
26|146|‘Iyata yi ache tata tomalokaka niraapade erai diya ha’bane
26|147|‘udyana arau jharnasamuhata
26|148|‘sasyaksetrata arau sukomala joka bisista khejura baganata
26|149|‘arau tomaloke nipunatara saite pahara kati yibora grha nirmana karaicha.
26|150|‘Eteke tomaloke allahara takbaraa aralambana karaa arau moka anusarana karaa.
26|151|‘Arau tomaloke simalanghanakarai sakalara nirdesara anugatya nakaraiba
26|152|‘yisakale prthiraita biparyaya srsti karae arau sansodhana (tatha santi sthapana) nakarae’.
26|153|Sihamte ka’le, ‘tumi haicha yadukaraibilakara an'yatama.
26|154|‘Tumi dekhuna amara darae'i ejana manuha, seye tumi yadi satyabadi horaa tente eta nidarsana lai aha’.
26|155|Te'om ka’le, ‘e'ijani haiche (nidarsaniya) uta, iyara babe ache pani khoraara pala, arau tomalokara babe'o ache eta nirdharaita dinata pani khoraara pala.
26|156|‘Arau tomaloke iyara kono anista sadhana nakaraiba, yadi (anista sadhana) karaa tente maha dirasara sasti tomalokara oparata apatita ha’ba’.
26|157|Tathapi'o sihamte se'i utajanika badha karaile, parainamata sihamta anutapta ha’la.
26|158|Eteke sastiye sihamtaka graasa karaile. Niscaya iyata ache nidarsana, kintu sihamtara bechibhage'i mumina nahaya.
26|159|Arau tomara raba, niscaya te'om mahaparaakramasali, parama dayalu.
26|160|Lutara sampradaye'o raachulasakalaka asbikara karaichila
26|161|yetiya sihamtara bhatr lute kaichila, ‘tomaloke takbaraa aralambana nakaraibane
26|162|‘niscaya ma'i tomalokara babe ejana bisbasta raachula.
26|163|‘Eteke tomaloke allahara takbaraa aralambana karaa arau mora anugatya karaa.
26|164|‘Iyara babe ma'i tomalokara ocarata kono pratidana nibicarao, mora pratidana kerala srstijagatara raba (allaha)ra ocarata.
26|165|‘Srstijagatara majata tomaloke kerala purausasakalara ocarate'i upagata horaa
26|166|‘arau tomalokara pratipalake tomalokara babe ye straisakalaka srsti karaiche sihamtaka tomaloke barjana karai thaka? Baram tomaloke haicha eta simalanghanakarai sampradaya’.
26|167|Sihamte ka’le, ‘he luta! Tumi yadi birata nohoraa, tente niscaya tumi bahiskara ha’ba’.
26|168|Te'om ka’le, ‘niscaya ma'i tomalokara karmaka ghrna karao.
26|169|(Te'om praarthana karai ka’le,) ‘he mora raba! Moka arau mora paraiyalaka sihamtara e'i karmara paraa raksa karaa’.
26|170|Phalata ami te'omka arau te'omra paraiyalabargaka raksa karailo.
26|171|Kerala se'i brd'dhajanira bahirae, yijani achila pichata arastharakarai bilakara antarbhukta.
26|172|Tara pichata ami bakibilakaka dhbansa karailo.
26|173|Arau ami sihamtara oparata sastimulaka silabrsti barsana karailo. Eteke bhiti pradarsitasakalara babe e'i brsti kimana ye nikrsta achila
26|174|niscaya iyata ache nidarsana, kintu sihamtara bechibhage'i mumina nahaya.
26|175|Arau tomara raba, niscaya te'om mahaparaakramasali, parama dayalu.
26|176|A'ikara adhibasisakale'o raachulasakalaka asbikara karaichila
26|177|yetiya chu'a'ibe sihamtaka kaichila, ‘tomaloke takbaraa aralambana nakaraibane
26|178|‘niscaya ma'i tomalokara babe ejana bisbasta raachula.
26|179|‘Eteke tomaloke allahara takbaraa aralambana karaa arau mora anugatya karaa.
26|180|‘Iyara babe ma'i tomalokara ocarata kono pratidana nibicarao, mora pratidana kerala srstijagatara raba (allaha)ra ocarata.
26|181|‘Tomaloke ojana karaomte paraipurna ojana karaiba, yibilake ojanata kama diye tomaloke sihamtara antarbhukta naha’ba.
26|182|‘Arau ojana karaiba sathika tulacanita.
26|183|‘Arau manuhaka sihamtara praapya bastu kama nidiba arau prthiraita biparyaya srsti karai nuphuraiba.
26|184|‘Arau se'i sattara takbaraa aralambana karaa yijane tomalokaka arau tomalokara purbarartisakalaka srsti karaiche’.
26|185|Sihamte ka’le, ‘niscaya tumi yadugrasta haicha.
26|186|‘Tumi dekhuna amara darae'i ejana manuha, arau ami tomaka michaliyabilakara antarbhukta buli bharao.
26|187|‘Eteke tumi yadi satyabadi horaa, tente akasara eta tukuraa amara oparata pela'i diya’.
26|188|Te'om ka’le, ‘mora pratipalake'i bhaladarae jane tomaloke yi karaa’.
26|189|Eteke sihamte te'omka asbikara karaile. Phalata sihamtaka meghacchanna dinara sastiye graasa karaile. Niscaya eya achila eta bhisana dinara sasti.
26|190|Niscaya iyata ache nidarsana, kintu sihamtara sarahabhage'i mumina nahaya.
26|191|Arau tomara raba, niscaya te'om mahaparaakramasali, parama dayalu.
26|192|Niscaya e'ito (kora'ana) srstijagatara raba (allaha)ra taraphara paraa aratirna.
26|193|Bisbasta rauhe (jibraile) seya lai aratarana karaiche.
26|194|Tomara hrdayata, yate tumi satarkakarai sakalara antarbhukta horaa.
26|195|Suspasta arabi bhasata.
26|196|Arau niscaya purbararti kitabasamuhata iyara ullekha ache.
26|197|E'ito sihamtara babe eta nidarsana nahayane barau ye, bani icharaa'ilara alimasakale e'i bisaye jane
26|198|arau yadi ami iyaka kono anarabara prati aratirna karailohemtena
26|199|arau se'ito te'om sihamtara ocarata patha karaile tathapi'o sihamte iyara prati imana posana nakarailehemtena.
26|200|E'idarae'i ami bisayato aparaadhisakalara antarata sancara karaicho.
26|201|Sihamte yantranadayaka sasti nedekha laike iyara oparata imana posana nakaraiba.
26|202|Eteke se'i (sasti)to sihamtara ocarata akasmikabharae ahi paraiba, athaca sihamte ekorae upalabdhi karaiba noraaraiba.
26|203|Tetiya sihamte ka’ba, ‘amaka alapa arakasa diya ha’bane’
26|204|tente sihamte amara sasti tbaraanbita karaiba bicarae neki
26|205|tumi bhabi coraacona! Yadi ami sihamtaka dirghakala bhoga-bilasa karaibalai di'om
26|206|tara pichata sihamtaka yi bisaye satarka karaa haichila seya sihamtara ocarata ahi parae
26|207|tetiya sihamtaka yi bhoga-bilasara upakarana hicape diya haichila seya sihamtara kono upakarata ahibane
26|208|arau ami ene kono janapada dhbansa karaa na'i yara babe kono satarkakarai nachila
26|209|(sihamtara babe) smarana hicape; arau ami an'yayakarai nahaya.
26|210|Arau cayatanabilake eya lai aratarana karaa na'i.
26|211|Arau sihamta e'i kamara yogya'o nahaya lagate sihamte e'i kamara samartha'o naraakhe.
26|212|Niscaya sihamtaka srarana karaara paraa'o amtarata rakha haiche.
26|213|Eteke tumi allahara lagata ana kono ilahaka ahbana nakaraiba, an'yatha tumi sastipraaptabilakara antarbhukta ha’ba.
26|214|Arau tumi tomara nikatatmiya sakalaka satarka karaa.
26|215|Arau yisakale tomara anusarana karae, te'omlokara prati tomara bahu aranata karaa.
26|216|Eteke yadi sihamte tomara abadhya haya, tente koraa, ‘tomaloke yi karaa, niscaya ma'i tara paraa sampurna mukta’.
26|217|Arau tumi nirbhara karaa paraakramasali, parama dayalu (allaha)ra oparata
26|218|yijane tomaka dekhe yetiya tumi (chalatara babe) thiya horaa
26|219|arau (teraemi) chajadakarai sakalara majata tomara gatibidhi (laksya karae).
26|220|Niscaya te'om sarbasraota, sarbajna.
26|221|Ma'i tomalokaka sambada dimane, kara oparata cayatana aratirna haya
26|222|sihamta aratirna haya pratyeka carama michaliya arau papista byaktira oparata.
26|223|Sihamte kana pati thake arau sihamtara adhikansa'i michaliya.
26|224|Arau kabisakala, sihamtara anusarana kerala bibhraantabilakehe karae.
26|225|Tumi laksya karaa na'ine ye, sihamta udbhraanta hai pratyeka upatyakata ghurai phurae
26|226|arau sihamte enekuraa katha kaya, yito sihamte (nije'i) nakarae.

26|227|Kintu te'omlokara bahirae yisakale imana aniche, satkarma karaiche, arau allahaka bechi bechi smarana karaiche arau atyacaraita horaara pichata pratisodha grahana karaiche. Arau yalimasakale atisighrae'i janibalai paba ye, kona dharanara gantabyasthalata sihamte pratyarartana karaiba.
